.table baseEdge
----
application/datalog

edge{from: F, to: T} :-
  baseEdge{from: F, to: T} |
  baseEdge{from: F, to: I} & edge{from: I, to: T}.
----
application/datalog

baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
----
application/datalog
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "T": "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "T": "B"}}, step: 3}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "T": "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, step: 5}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "T": "B"}}, step: 1}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B"}}, step: 2}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, step: 0}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "B"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "A", "T": "B"}}, step: 6}.

baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
----
application/datalog
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "C", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "C", "T": "D"}}, step: 3}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "C", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, step: 5}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "C", "T": "D"}}, step: 1}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "C", "I": "D"}}, step: 2}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, step: 0}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "C", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "C", "T": "D"}}, step: 6}.

baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
----
application/datalog
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "C"}}, step: 11}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "C"}}, step: 13}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "D"}}, step: 14}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "D"}}, step: 16}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C", "T": "D"}}, step: 6}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}}, step: 8}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "4", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C", "T": "D"}}, step: 4}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "T": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "0", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "T": "C"}}, step: 3}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "T": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "edge", output: record{rec: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, step: 5}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"I": "B", "T": "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "4", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "C"}}, step: 9}.
step{input: bindings{bindings: {"I": "B", "T": "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "4", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "A", "I": "B", "T": "D"}}, step: 12}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "1", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "T": "C"}}, step: 1}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "2", output: bindings{bindings: {"F": "B", "I": "C"}}, step: 2}.
step{input: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "baseEdge", output: record{rec: baseEdge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, step: 0}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "A", "T": "C"}}, step: 15}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "A", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "A", "T": "D"}}, step: 18}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "B", to: "C"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "B", "T": "C"}}, step: 7}.
step{input: record{rec: edge{from: "B", to: "D"}}, multiplicity: 1, node: "3", output: bindings{bindings: {"I": "B", "T": "D"}}, step: 10}.

edge{from: F, to: T}?
----
application/datalog
edge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "C"}.
edge{from: "A", to: "D"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "D"}.
edge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
